DOC.brief_summary: The investigator examine : 1. relationship insulin level natriuretic peptide hormone level , 2. effect administer infusion natriuretic peptide hormone breakdown fat healthy lean otherwise healthy obese individual .
DOC.detailed_description: The cardiac natriuretic peptide hormonal system may protect development cardiometabolic risk . Epidemiologic study show relatively healthy individual without heart failure , low natriuretic peptide level associate unfavorable cardiometabolic phenotype , include high blood pressure , obesity , high insulin level , diabetes mellitus . Understanding mechanism behind `` natriuretic peptide deficiency '' obesity would illuminate important way obesity interact cardiovascular system . The investigator propose prospective cross-over design 40 healthy lean otherwise healthy obese individual . The investigator propose follow specific aim hypothesis : Aim 1 : To study effect hyperinsulinemia response natriuretic peptide system salt load . Hypothesis 1 : Hyperinsulinemia suppress natriuretic peptide level obese lean individual . Aim 2 : To examine effect intravenous infusion natriuretic peptide acute marker lipolysis . Hypothesis 2 : An intravenous infusion natriuretic peptide raise acute marker lipolysis obese lean individual .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 1850 year BMI 18 < 25 kg/m2 ( lean group , N=20 ) BMI 30 < 40 kg/m2 ( obese group , N=20 ) Current use antihypertensive medication Current use glucocorticoid , metformin , antidiabetes medication Prior current cardiovascular disease , renal disease , liver disease Diabetes mellitus ( take insulin , antidiabetic agent , dietcontrolled ) Atrial fibrillation Bleeding disorder anemia Elevated LFTs estimuated GFR < 60 ml/min Abnormal sodium potassium level Positive pregnancy test , woman childbearing age practice birth control , woman breastfeed
